text: 4.41 Mat 8.29, Mak 1.25, 1.34, 3.11-12 Pen binɨb kuŋay kɨcheki tap okok mulɨk sɨkɨl yek okok, agyokek seŋ jakɨl, amɨlɨg suk awl agɨl agɨlak, Nad God Ñɨne agɨlak. Anɨb agel kɨlop ag gɨl agak, Nɨbi anɨb ma agɨnɨmɨb agak. Taynen? Kɨli nepal, Jisas ne Bɨ God nop aglup ak, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab.
